import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector, } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return( <>

Shipping

Adress: {cart.shippingAdress.adress}, {cart.shippingAdress.city},{' '}, {cart.shippingAdress.postalCode},{' '}, {cart.shippingAdress.country}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
